holidays.name: International Joke Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to sharing laughter and telling your best jokes to friends, family, and coworkers. It's an opportunity to brighten someone's day with humor and wit.
holidays.origin: While the exact origin is unclear, International Joke Day has been celebrated informally online and among humor enthusiasts to encourage joy and lightheartedness worldwide.
holidays.funFact: The best jokes on International Joke Day often come from unexpected places‚Äîlike dad jokes! Perfect day to break out your punniest lines.

holidays.name: World UFO Day
holidays.description: Celebrates the existence and sightings of Unidentified Flying Objects. Fans of extraterrestrial life gather to share stories, watch sci-fi movies, and keep an eye on the skies.
holidays.origin: Created by enthusiasts to raise awareness about UFOs and promote research into alien life, this day encourages open-mindedness about the universe's mysteries.
holidays.funFact: July 1 was chosen because some believe an alleged UFO incident happened on this day in 1947 at Roswell, New Mexico.

holidays.name: Creative Ice Cream Flavors Day
holidays.description: A delicious celebration that encourages ice cream lovers and makers to invent and enjoy the weirdest, wildest, and most creative ice cream flavors imaginable.
holidays.origin: This unofficial food holiday arose from the ice cream industry's love of innovation and consumers' desire for unique tastes and experiences.
holidays.funFact: Some creative ice cream flavors include bacon, wasabi, and even garlic ‚Äî dare to try one today?
